dilation noun
(BECOMING WIDER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] esp. medical the process of becoming wider or more open: dilation of blood vessels
dilation noun
(CHANGING SHAPE)
[ C ]
  geometry a change in the shape of a figure in which is it made larger or smaller according to a scale (= relationship of sizes)
